column1: The tripeptides resulting from such processing include Gly - Pro - Met, Gly - Pro - Arg, and Gly - Pro - Ala.

Fifty micrograms ( 6E10 and CT15) or 5 mu g ( 22C11) of brain homogenate was loaded per lane onto 7. 5%, 10% - 20%, or 4% - 20% Tris - HCl PAGE gels ( Bio - Rad Laboratories, Hercules, California, United States) and electrophoresed for several hours in 1 x Tris - glycine - sodium dodecyl sulfate ( 1 x TG - SDS) buffer ( 6E10 and 22C11; Amresco, Solon, Ohio, United States) or 1 x Tris - tricine - SDS buffer ( CT15; Invitrogen, Carlsbad, California, United States).

After hybridizing overnight at 65 degrees C in 1% BSA / 1 mM EDTA / 0. 5 M sodium phosphate buffer ( pH 7. 2) / 7% SDS [ 20], the blots were washed twice at 65 degrees C for 30 min each in 0. 1% BSA / 1 mM EDTA / 40 mM sodium phosphate buffer ( pH 7. 2) / 5% SDS before two final 30 - min washes at 65 degrees C with 1 mM EDTA / 40 mM sodium phosphate buffer ( pH 7. 2) / 1% SDS.
